alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Caldwell Mountains; Greater Caldwell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 2:18PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN ALEXANDER...CALDWELL AND CENTRAL BURKE COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EDT... At 218 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Blowing Rock to 7 miles southwest of Lenoir. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lenoir, Morganton, Sawmills, Granite Falls, Gamewell, Hudson, Cajah`s Mountain, Rhodhiss, Cedar Rock, and Lake Rhodhiss. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
